body:
expected behavior
create users and place them in groups. share folder so that groups have access to certain folders.

tell us what should happen
i have created users and groups. i have placed users in groups with cud permissions. when the user logs into the browser version, the user should see the shared folder.

tell us what happens instead
i have created users and groups. i have placed users in groups with cud permissions. when the user logins into the browser, the shared folder is not there. if i give the user cud permission instead of the group. the folder displays.

server configuration

operating system: windows 2008 std

web server: iis 7

database: mysql

php version: 5.4

owncloud version:5.0.6
client configuration 1.2.5

browser: mozilla firefox21.0

operating system:windows 7 pro

i’m closing this issue because it has been inactive for a few months. this probably means that the issue is not reproducible or it has been fixed in a newer version.

please reopen if you still encounter this issue with the [latest stable version](http://owncloud.org/install/) (currently owncloud 5.0.10) and then please use the [issue template](https://raw.github.com/owncloud/core/master/issue_template.md). you an also contribute directly by providing a patch – see the [developer manual](http://doc.owncloud.org/server/5.0/developer_manual/). :)

thank you!
